summary: Implements a text-to-image diffusion pipeline that combines a variational autoencoder, a frozen T5 text encoder with its tokenizer, a transformer-based denoiser, and a scheduler to convert textual prompts into high-resolution images through latent diffusion.
business_intent: Enable developers and enterprises to generate high-quality images from natural language descriptions for creative, marketing, and design workflows, reducing the need for manual graphic creation.
